attributeDefinition: site ID containing of four plots
Based on all species: Shannon diversity (Hill numbers 1 expressed in effective numbers of species)
Based on all species: Gini-Simpson diversity (Hill numbers 2 expressed in effective numbers of species)
Based on target species: Shannon diversity (Hill numbers 1 expressed in effective numbers of species)
Based on target species: Gini-Simpson diversity (Hill numbers 2 expressed in effective numbers of species)
Favorable Conservation Status index based on Hill numbers 0 = species richness
comment: Helm et al. (2015) https://doi.org/10.1111/ddi.12285 / Chao et al. (2014) https://doi.org/10.1146/annurev-ecolsys-120213-091540

attributeDefinition: Favorable Conservation Status index based on Hill numbers 1 = Shannon diversity
comment: Helm et al. (2015) https://doi.org/10.1111/ddi.12285 / Chao et al. (2014) https://doi.org/10.1146/annurev-ecolsys-120213-091541

attributeDefinition: Favorable Conservation Status index based on Hill numbers 2 = Gini-Simpson index
